name: lovelace-lcars-card
description: LCARS themed card for Home Assistant

scripts.test:e2e: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 node tests/e2e/setup-e2e.js && npm run build --silent && NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 bash -c 'playwright test --reporter=line "$@" 2>&1 | grep -v -E "(INFO \\(|homeassistant\\.|Setting up|Setup of domain|Registered new|Loaded |SyncWorker|Create cache|2025-|Pool recreating|Received unknown command|libturbojpeg|Support for the running Python|DeprecationWarning|Requirement already satisfied|Attempting install|turbojpeg library automatically)" | grep -v "^$"' --
scripts.test:e2e-full: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 node tests/e2e/setup-e2e.js && npm run build --silent && E2E_INCLUDE_YAML_BAK=1 NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 bash -c 'playwright test --reporter=line "$@" 2>&1 | grep -v -E "(INFO \\(|homeassistant\\.|Setting up|Setup of domain|Registered new|Loaded |SyncWorker|Create cache|2025-|Pool recreating|Received unknown command|libturbojpeg|Support for the running Python|DeprecationWarning|Requirement already satisfied|Attempting install|turbojpeg library automatically)" | grep -v "^$"' --
